hero_subtitle: Explore the history of astronomy, ancient horoscopy, and advanced computational tools to understand the link between the cosmos and destiny.
history_main_title: The Wondrous History of Astronomy and Esoteric Sciences
history_subtitle1: From Stargazing to Unveiling Cosmic Mysteries
history_p1: The history of astronomy is a story of humanity's endless curiosity to understand its place in the cosmos. This journey, which began with gazing at the night sky and charting star patterns, gradually intertwined with philosophy, mathematics, and esoteric sciences, laying the foundation for great civilizations.
history_p2: Around 3000 BC, the Babylonians, with their precise observations, recorded the movement patterns of the moon and planets. They were the first to use mathematics to predict celestial phenomena like eclipses and introduced the concept of the Zodiac to the world.
history_p3: The Greeks, with their philosophical and geometrical approach, developed cosmological models. Ptolemy, by proposing the geocentric model, influenced astronomical thought in the West and East for centuries. His works, especially the 'Almagest', became the cornerstone of Islamic astronomy.
history_subtitle4: The Islamic Golden Age: The Peak of Flourishing
history_p4: During the Abbasid Caliphate, Baghdad became the scientific center of the world. Scholars like Al-Khwarizmi, Al-Battani, and Ibn al-Haytham translated and enhanced Greek works. They perfected precise instruments like the astrolabe and made unprecedented observations that founded modern astronomy.
history_subtitle5: The Copernican Revolution: The Birth of Modern Astronomy
history_p5: In the 16th century, Nicolaus Copernicus revolutionized our understanding of the cosmos by proposing the heliocentric model. Later, Galileo's telescopic observations and Kepler's laws of planetary motion confirmed this model, paving the way for Newtonian physics.
history_quote: 'The heavens are a book written in luminous letters, and only those who have learned the language of mathematics and wisdom can read it.'
history_p6: Today, relying on space telescopes and advanced technologies, astronomy explores the mysteries of black holes, distant galaxies, and the very beginning of the universe itself. But this journey continues, and every new discovery raises deeper questions before us.
depth_main_title: Astronomy in the Lives of Creatures: From Antiquity to Today
depth_subtitle: From Agricultural Calendars to the Cosmic Instinct of Animals
depth_p1: The connection between humans, other creatures, and the sky is a story as old as life itself. Astronomy, beyond being a mere science, has been a key to survival, a tool for power, and a source for understanding our place in the cosmos. This influence extends from ancient civilizations to the hidden instincts in the animal world and today's advanced technologies.
depth_ancient_title: Astronomy in Ancient Civilizations: Agriculture, Religion, and Power
depth_ancient_p: For early civilizations like the Sumerians and Egyptians, the sky was a living calendar. The regular rising and setting of the sun, the phases of the moon, and the position of the stars determined the precise times for planting and harvesting. The annual flooding of the Nile, vital for Egyptian agriculture, coincided with the rising of the star Sirius. This astronomical knowledge not only ensured their survival but also bestowed divine power upon priests and rulers, as they appeared to understand the language of the heavens and interpret the will of the gods. Monuments like Stonehenge and the pyramids of Egypt were built in precise alignment with astronomical events like solstices and equinoxes.
depth_horoscopy_title: Horoscopy and Esoteric Sciences: The Link Between Heaven and Destiny
depth_horoscopy_p: From detailed astronomical observations, the belief arose that if celestial bodies affect the seasons and nature on Earth, they must also influence human destiny. Horoscopy emerged as an attempt to discover this cosmic connection. In royal courts, astrologers advised kings by analyzing the position of planets at the moment of a person's birth (the horoscope) or before important decisions like war and marriage. This knowledge, intertwined with the Hermetic philosophy of 'as above, so below,' became one of the most profound and influential intellectual currents in human history.
depth_animals_title: Astronomy in the Animal World: Cosmic Instinct
depth_animals_p: Humans are not the only creatures who look to the sky. Many animals use an 'internal compass' calibrated by celestial bodies. Migratory birds use the position of the stars for navigation during their long journeys at night. Some insects, like dung beetles, use the Milky Way to move in a straight line. The reproductive cycles of many marine creatures, such as corals, are synchronized with the phases of the moon and tides. This 'cosmic instinct' shows how deeply life on Earth is intertwined with cosmic rhythms.
depth_modern_title: Modern Astronomy and Today's Life: From GPS to Understanding the Cosmos
depth_modern_p: The legacy of thousands of years of sky observation is manifested in our modern technologies today. The Global Positioning System (GPS) in our smartphones operates on the precise principles of celestial mechanics and satellite orbital calculations, rooted in the work of Kepler and Newton. Advanced space telescopes have transformed our understanding of the Big Bang, black holes, and the possibility of life on other planets. Ultimately, the human quest to understand the cosmos, which began out of a need for survival and curiosity, now answers the deepest philosophical questions about our origin and future.
calculator_section_subtitle: Advanced tools to explore the mysteries of ascendants, qarins, and cosmic positions based on ancient methods and precise calculations.
astrological_calc_desc: This tool, using the method of <1>Sheikh Baha'i</1> and based on the <2>Abjad KabÄ«r</2> of your name and your mother's name, calculates your ascendant sign and its ruling planet, providing a mystical analysis.
astrological_calc_summary: Your name is the frequency of your soul, and your mother's name is your gateway to this world. Their combination is the key to understanding your ascendant.
astrological_calc_placeholder_result: The result of your ascendant analysis will be displayed here.
pd_title: Personal Analysis Based on Ruling Planet
pd_desc: This section provides a deep analysis of your innate strengths and weaknesses based on the ruling planet of your ascendant. By understanding this energy, you can better utilize your potential and overcome your challenges.
pd_summary: Your ruling planet, like a celestial guide, holds the roadmap to your growth. Understanding its powers and weaknesses is the key to your success.
loading_ruler_planet: Analyzing the influences of the ruling planet...
error_enter_names: Please enter your name and your mother's name.
taleh_calc_desc: This tool combines three key factors (Name Ascendant Number, Day of Birth, and Spiritual Number) to provide a comprehensive analysis of your fortune's overall energy quality, determining whether it tends towards auspiciousness (happiness) or inauspiciousness (hardship).
birth_day_label: Day of the week of birth
error_fill_all_fields: Please fill in all the information.
conversion_title: Methods to Convert an Inauspicious Fortune to Auspicious
conversion_method2_desc: The first hour after sunrise is always auspicious. During this time, writing your daily plan or setting intentions has a tremendous effect.
summary_swing: Your fortune is fluctuating and influenced by your choices. With awareness, you can guide it towards auspiciousness.
summary_saad: Your fortune is generally auspicious and good. Paths are smoother for you. Gratitude strengthens this energy.
summary_nahs: Your fortune tends towards heaviness and hardship. You need more effort and patience for success. Take the conversion methods seriously.
qarin_desc: The Qarin is the reflection of your energy from the moment of birth. This tool calculates the frequency name of your Qarin based on the 'definitive Qarin name method', using your name, mother's name, and day of birth.
qarin_placeholder_text: The result of the Qarin name calculation will be displayed here.
qarin_method_p1: First Letter: Derived from the sum of the Abjad values of your name, your mother's name, and your day of birth. This sum is reduced to a root number (1-9), and the corresponding letter is extracted from the table below:
qarin_method_p2: Second Letter: The second letter of your first name.
qarin_method_p3: Third Letter: The first letter with an Abjad value less than 10 from the end of the mother's name.
qarin_error_name_length: Your name must be at least two letters long.
qarin_error_final_letter: Error finding the third letter from the mother's name ({motherName}).
qarin_error_ai: Error communicating with the AI service to generate the name.
profile_manager_desc: By saving your information (name, mother's name, and birth details), you can use the various calculation tools faster and more easily, without needing to re-enter your data each time.
no_profile_selected: No profile selected. Create a new one or select a saved profile to begin.
celestial_body_placeholder: Example: Orion Nebula or Planet Mars
scientific_report_placeholder: The scientific report on your chosen celestial body will be displayed here.
horoscope_calc_desc: The horoscope, or sky map at the moment of birth, is one of the most important astrological tools for deeply understanding personality, talents, and life path. By entering precise birth information, receive a narrative analysis of your horoscope.
error_horoscope_generic: Error generating analysis. Please try again later.
term_ascendant_desc: This is the sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at the moment of a person's birth. In Abjad calculations, it is determined based on the person's and their mother's names, representing the individual's inherent and general characteristics.
term_ruler_desc: Each zodiac sign is ruled by one of the seven classical planets, which is called the 'ruler' or 'lord' of that sign. This ruling planet has significant effects on the person's destiny and traits.
term_nature_desc: Each sign has a specific nature or temperament (fiery, earthy, airy, watery), which arises from the combination of hot, cold, dry, and moist qualities, influencing physical and psychological characteristics. For example, the temperament of Gemini is hot and moist (airy).
term_dignities_desc: These terms describe the strength and weakness of planets in different signs:
term_dignity_exaltation: Exaltation: The best and most powerful position for a planet.
term_dignity_fall: Fall: The weakest and most unfavorable position for a planet.
term_dignity_detriment: Detriment: A position where the planet acts weakly and has unfavorable effects.
term_planets_type_desc: In Islamic astronomical and philosophical traditions, planets are divided into two categories: superior and inferior. Superior planets are those farther from the Earth (from outside the Sun's orbit to Saturn), and inferior planets are those closer to the Earth (from the Sun to the Moon). This classification is based on their position relative to the Earth and their orbits in the celestial spheres.
term_planets_classification_title: ğŸŒŒ Classification of Planets in Islamic Tradition
term_planets_classification_desc: In ancient cosmology, especially in the works of Muslim astronomers like Abd al-Rahman al-Sufi and Nasir al-Din al-Tusi, planets are divided into two main groups:
term_philosophy_basis_list:
• This classification is rooted in Ptolemaic cosmology, which was adopted and localized by Islamic astronomers.
  • In Islamic philosophy, superior planets were usually associated with intellect and spirituality, while inferior planets were more related to nature and physicality.
  • In astronomical and horoscopic texts, this classification was used to analyze the effects of planets on the destinies and characteristics of humans.
term_ausp_inausp_desc: In the tradition of Islamic astronomy, of the seven classical planets, two are considered malefic, two benefic, two neutral (rulers of the heavens), and one convertible.
term_seven_planets_title: ğŸŒŒ Effects of the Seven Planets on Destiny
term_malefics_list:
• Saturn â€“ Greater Malefic: Symbol of hardship, delay, poverty, long illnesses, sorrow, and separation. However, if well-placed, it can indicate patience, stability, and wisdom.
  • Mars â€“ Lesser Malefic: Symbol of war, bloodshed, fire, conflict, and danger. In a positive state, it represents courage, boldness, and the power to act.
term_benefics_list:
• Jupiter â€“ Greater Benefic: Symbol of blessing, happiness, wealth, justice, and greatness. Its presence in a horoscope usually indicates success and prosperity.
  • Venus â€“ Lesser Benefic: Symbol of love, beauty, art, joy, and pleasure. In a horoscope, it enhances affection, friendship, and enjoyment.
term_luminaries_list:
• Sun: The source of light and life; a symbol of power, royalty, and glory. Depending on its position, it can bring both good and ill.
  • Moon: Symbol of change, flexibility, emotions, and daily life. Its effect varies depending on its condition and aspects with other planets.
term_neutral_list: • Mercury: Symbol of intellect, knowledge, speech, and writing. It becomes benefic with benefics (knowledge and success) and malefic with malefics (deception, lies, anxiety).
qamar_section_subtitle: In astrology, when the Moon is in the Scorpio sign or constellation, it is considered an inauspicious time. It is advised to avoid important matters. Check the current status and upcoming periods here.
qamar_status_true: The Moon is currently in Scorpio
qamar_status_false: The Moon is NOT in Scorpio
qamar_status_false_desc: It's a good time for important matters.
qamar_method_explanation_text: The 'Zodiac Sign' is an equal 12-part division of the ecliptic used in Western (Tropical) astrology. The 'Constellation' refers to the actual, unequal star groups in the night sky, used in Vedic and some traditional (Sidereal) forms of astrology. Both methods are valid within their respective astrological systems.
qamar_prohibited_title: What to Avoid During Moon in Scorpio?
qamar_prohibited_list:
• Marriage contracts
  • Important travel
  • Conception
  • Starting a new business
  • Laying the foundation for important projects
qamar_mitigation_p1: In Islamic sources, the following are recommended to ward off negative effects:
qamar_mitigation_l1: Giving Charity: Giving charity in the morning is said to remove the day's inauspiciousness.
qamar_mitigation_l2: Reciting Quran: Reciting Al-Mu'awwidhatayn (Surahs Al-Falaq and An-Nas) is highly recommended.
dashboard_ruler_day_special: Today is your ruling day! An excellent time for important matters.
dream_interpreter_desc: Dreams are the language of the soul. Write your dream and let the 'Dream Sage' reveal its message, inspired by ancient sources, scripture, psychology, and mysticism.
horary_calc_desc: By asking a question, a sky chart is drawn for that moment, and the answer is extracted. You can ask about the present, past, or future.
horary_select_time: Select the time of the question:
horary_loading_text: Observing the sky for an answer...
relationship_desc: Analyze the compatibility and dynamics between two individuals based on their ascendants, elements, ruling planets, and numerology. Select two profiles and receive a deep analysis of the strengths, challenges, and future of your relationship.
relationship_error_all_fields: Please select both profiles and specify the relationship type.
relationship_error_same_profile: Cannot compare a profile with itself.
relationship_error_not_enough_profiles: You must have at least two saved profiles to use this feature.
jafar_desc: The science of Jafar is the art of extracting an answer from the letters of a question. Write your question clearly and with pure intent, and let the 'Sage of Letters' reveal the answer by simulating the ancient process of divination.
jafar_placeholder: Write your question here (e.g., Will this endeavor be successful?)
jafar_loading: Extracting the answer from the tablets...
jafri_name_analysis_title: Name Analysis via Science of Jafr
jafri_name_analysis_desc: This tool uses complex Jafri calculations on your name and your mother's name to analyze the deep layers of your personality, spiritual path, and destiny.
jafri_name_analysis_summary: Your name is the key to deciphering the cosmic map of your being.
loading_jafri_analysis: Deciphering the secrets of your name...
abjad_calculator_desc: Enter a name, word, or sentence to calculate its numerical value based on the two main Abjad methods (Great and Small).
abjad_calculator_placeholder: Enter your desired name or sentence here...
abjad_explanation_p1: Abjad calculations are based on assigning a numerical value to each letter of the Arabic alphabet:
abjad_explanation_kabir: The standard numerical values of each letter are summed up (e.g., A=1, B=2, ..., Gh=1000).
abjad_explanation_saghir: The great Abjad value of each letter is divided by 9, and its remainder is calculated (if the remainder is zero, 9 is used). Then, these small values are summed up.
ofagh_desc: Generate magic squares (Ofagh) based on a base number or verify an existing square for correctness.
ofagh_base_number_label: Base Number (e.g., Abjad of a name)
ofagh_error_invalid_number: Please enter a valid positive integer.
ofagh_error_incompatible_number: The entered number is not compatible for generating a {size}x{size} square.
ofagh_result_valid: This is a valid magic square.
ofagh_result_invalid: This is not a valid magic square.
ofagh_explanation_p1: Magic squares are built on precise mathematical algorithms to ensure the sum of each row, column, and diagonal is equal:
ofagh_explanation_3x3: Subtract 30 from the base number and divide by 3. The result + 1 is the 'key' (Miftah), which is distributed in the cells based on a specific pattern.
ofagh_explanation_4x4: Subtract 130 from the base number and divide by 4. The result + 1 is the 'key', and 16 consecutive numbers from it are placed in the grid according to a complex pattern.
ofagh_explanation_5x5: Subtract 325 from the base number and divide by 5. The result + 1 is the 'key', and numbers are placed using the Siamese method.
ramal_desc: Geomancy is a tool for prediction and analysis based on 16 figures. Click the button to cast your geomantic chart and discover the meaning of each house.
ramal_explanation_title: How the Geomantic Chart is Generated (Taksir)
ramal_explanation_p1: The geomantic chart consists of 16 figures, generated through a precise mathematical algorithm called 'Taksir':
ramal_explanation_step1_desc: The first four figures are generated randomly (simulating dotting or dice throws).
ramal_explanation_step2_desc: These four figures are created from the rows of the first four figures. For example, the fifth figure is composed of the top dots of the first four figures.
ramal_explanation_step3_desc: The remaining figures are generated by combining previous figures in pairs. The combination rule is mathematical addition modulo 2 (if odd, 1 dot; if even, 2 dots). This process continues until the fifteenth figure (The Judge) is created.
ramal_explanation_step4_desc: The final figure is derived by combining the fifteenth figure (The Judge) and the first figure (The Ascendant), representing the final outcome.
ramal_house_1_desc: Relates to the personality, appearance, and general state of the querent.
ramal_house_2_desc: Relates to financial status, assets, and resources.
ramal_house_3_desc: Relates to siblings, relatives, and short journeys.
ramal_house_4_desc: Relates to the father, family, property, and the end of matters.
ramal_house_5_desc: Relates to children, love affairs, creativity, and news.
ramal_house_6_desc: Relates to health, illnesses, and subordinates.
ramal_house_7_desc: Relates to marriage, partners (emotional or business), and open enemies.
ramal_house_8_desc: Relates to inheritance, crises, deep transformations, and hidden matters.
ramal_house_9_desc: Relates to long journeys, higher education, religion, and philosophy.
ramal_house_10_desc: Relates to career, status, fame, and the mother.
ramal_house_11_desc: Relates to wishes, friends, and supporters.
ramal_house_12_desc: Relates to hidden enemies, limitations, and secret affairs.
ramal_house_13_desc: The current state and intention of the person asking.
ramal_house_14_desc: The state of the matter being asked about.
ramal_house_15_desc: The overall judgment and result of the reading.
ramal_house_16_desc: The final result and ultimate outcome of the matter.
